name: aibandbiaiffaiffb
body: |- wb(wa(wi(w0, w1), wi(w1, w0)), wb(w0, w1))

comment: A closed form showing (a implies b and b implies a) same-as (a same-as b). (Contributed by Jarvin Udandy, 3-Sep-2016.)
